inclusion.criterion: Men with a diagnosis of HGPIN or ASAP in a minimum of 1 of 8 cores from a biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prostate biopsy with a minimum of 8 cores performed within 6 months of study entry that shows no evidence of cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 30-80 years of age at the time of registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants must have normal organ and marrow function as demonstrated by the following parameters being within normal institutional limits: complete blood count (CBC); liver function tests (LFTs); albumin, total and direct bilirubin, alkaline phosphatase, aspartic transaminase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT), and total protein
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine <1.5 mg/dl or measured creatinine clearance 60 cc/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of consumption of toremifene citrate, finasteride, testosterone, dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA) or other testosterone-like supplements or medications which have known impact on PSA within 30 days of informed consent, or dutasteride within 90 days of informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absence of consumption of any nutritional or herbal supplements containing green tea or green tea polyphenols
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No or low regular tea consumption (no more than 3 servings of hot tea or 6 servings of iced tea per week)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to discontinue current vitamin/mineral supplement use and substitute with a standard multivitamin supplement provided for the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of acute prostatitis or urinary tract infection at the time of PSA measurement; men may be enrolled 30 days after completion of treatment, provided all other eligibility criteria are met
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior history of prostate cancer or other malignancies (exceptions include non-melanoma skin cancer or other cancer with no evidence of tumor recurrence 5 years after definitive treatment)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with acute urinary retention. He has a large prostate and bladder filled with urine, but his recent blood chemistry was normal.
